info.name: Wolt Marketplace Integrations
info.description:
‚ùóBefore using the collection make sure to select a corresponding environment.

### Environment variables

To be able to test the endpoints, please provide the following variables and secrets in the **current value** fields of the environment.

#### For testing the Authentication flow

- `oauth_client_id`
    
- `oauth_client_secret`
    
- `authorization_code`
    
- `redirect_url`
    

#### For testing Integration APIs

- `venue_id`
    
- `order_id`
    

Please note that `access_token` and `refresh_token` variables will be automatically populated after calling `Get access token with authorization code` and `Get access token with refresh token`.
